alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:46AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Franklin, central Crawford, northeastern Sebastian and northeastern Sequoyah Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 546 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Short, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Cedarville... Alma... Mulberry... Dyer... Rudy... Figure Five... Short... Kibler... Concord... Shibley... Piney... Uniontown... Furry... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 26. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
